mapper.select: SELECT TS.SEATS_ID AS seatId, TS.GRADE_ID AS gradeId, SG.GRADE_NAME AS gradeName, PSP.PRICE AS price, TS.SEAT_STATUS AS status, TS.SHOW_DATE AS showDate, TS.SHOW_TIME AS showTime FROM TB_TICKET_SEAT TS JOIN TB_SEAT_GRADE SG ON TS.GRADE_ID = SG.GRADE_ID JOIN TB_PERFORMANCE_SEAT_PRICE PSP ON TS.GRADE_ID = PSP.GRADE_ID AND TS.MT20ID = PSP.MT20ID WHERE TS.SHOW_DATE = TO_DATE(#{showDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TS.SHOW_TIME = #{showTime}

SELECT PD.PRFNM AS performanceName, PD.PRFPDFROM AS performanceFrom, PD.PRFPDTO AS performanceTo, PD.FCLTYNM AS facilityName, PD.PRFRUNTIME AS performanceRuntime, PD.POSTER AS poster FROM "TB_PERFORMANCES_DETAIL" PD WHERE PD.MT20ID = #{performanceId}
